title: -- Medisphere - Hackathon Project (Top 10 Finalist!)
description: A streamlined healthcare platform connecting organ donors, recipients, and medical professionals. Built to modernize the organ donation process with smart tech, faster communication, and a compassionate, life-saving focus.

title: -- Sidframe - Blog website
description: Sidframe is my personal blog where I share insights on technology, creativity, and self-growth, wrapped in a minimal design and smooth, distraction-free reading experience.

title: -- Sidiot Media - Graphic n' Motion Design Portfolio
description: Sidiotic Media is my visual portfolio showcasing my work in graphic design, motion graphics, and video editing, focused on bold visuals, storytelling, and impactful creative direction.

title: -- Greentrek - Hackathon Project (First-Hackathon!)
description: We created a website during 24-hour hackathon to spread awareness on sustainability and GreenTech. Our project features interactive elements and educational content to engage users in eco-friendly practices.

title: -- Portfolio
description: A minimal, terminal-inspired portfolio showcasing my projects, skills, and tools. Designed for focus, clarity, and a clean developer-first experience.
